alert.note: Alert for Borden; Glasscock; Howard; Martin; Midland; Mitchell; Scurry (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 02 at 8:20PM CDT until June 02 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR EASTERN BORDEN, NORTHWESTERN GLASSCOCK, HOWARD, SOUTHEASTERN MARTIN, NORTHEASTERN MIDLAND, NORTHWESTERN MITCHELL AND SCURRY COUNTIES... At 820 PM CDT, Flooding was reported earlier in Big Spring and is possible in Snyder. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. Additional rainfall amounts less than 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Trained spotters reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Big Spring, Snyder, Greenwood, Stanton, Coahoma, J B Thomas Reservoir, Sand Springs, Fluvanna, Lomax, Vincent, Knapp, Cuthbert, Ira, Randalls Corner, Winston Field, Dunn, Big Spring Country Club, Big Spring McMahon-Wrinkle Airpark, Elbow and Hermleigh. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

area.areaDesc: Borden; Glasscock; Howard; Martin; Midland; Mitchell; Scurry
